org.codehaus.groovy.grails.web.filters
[Java] Class HiddenHttpMethodFilter.HttpMethodRequestWrapper

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.ServletRequestWrapper
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper
          org.codehaus.groovy.grails.web.filters.HiddenHttpMethodFilter.HttpMethodRequestWrapper

protected static class HiddenHttpMethodFilter.HttpMethodRequestWrapper
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequestWrapper

Simple javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest wrapper that returns the supplied method for javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest#getMethod().
